message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. With its cutting-edge features and unparalleled performance, it's truly a game-changer. I understand that the value of this product might be subjective, but based on its unique capabilities and market demand, I believe we can agree on a fair price. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $18000, which reflects its exceptional quality and potential impact. I trust that you will find its benefits invaluable for your needs. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product.
